title: What age group of people are most affected by COVID-19? - Quora

response.answer_text: In terms of requiring special care in hospitals, people above 60 65 are most likely to be affected. Younger people are more likely to remain asymptomatic or with low fever ( less than 102 deg F) managed with home care.

It is said that in about 580 hospitals nearly 20 patients diagonised by coronavirus are between the age of 20- 44. About 18 patients are between the age of 44–55. About 1 patient is between the age of 0- 19.
